items.title: Which platforms will offer crypto ETNs?
items.description: Crypto ETNs will soon once again be available to UK investors. We reveal the investment platforms planning to offer them to customers.

items.title: Healthcare stocks look cheap, but tread carefully
items.description: Shares in healthcare companies could get a shot in the arm if uncertainty over policy in the US wanes, but are they worth the risk?

items.title: The Palace of Westminster is falling down
items.description: The Palace of Westminster is in need of repair, but the bill is prohibitive, says Simon Wilson

items.title: 'It’s time to buy British equities'
items.description: There is no better place to start investing in UK equities than with two of MoneyWeek’s favourite investment trusts, says Max King

items.title: 'Gen Z is facing an AI jobs bloodbath'
items.description: It has always been tough to get your first job, but this year, it's proving tougher than ever. AI is to blame, says Matthew Lynn
